title: Motel scene | Richard Ramirez & The German Tourist | AHS 09x06

comment: bro id be like say no more im coming in
fun fact, the real Ramirez was a huge fan of Billy idol

omg i JUST realized the tourist said she was going to disneyland with her family and that was a direct reference to what richard ramirez said after he was sentenced to death: "see you in disneyland." I-
its crazy how much he looks like the actual ramirez.
